## BatchOperationsService.batchMove() method

Moves a batch of items. This operation returns an instance of 'BatchOperationCreationResult' type.

**Signature:**

```typescript

        requestModel: BatchCopyOrMoveRequest;
    }): CancelablePromise<BatchOperationCreationResult>;
```
